abstract: As mortgage rules under the Dodd-Frank Act are finished, banks and policy makers want legal protections against lawsuits, while others worry that this will deny borrowers a critical safeguard.
snippet: As mortgage rules under the Dodd-Frank Act are finished, banks and policy makers want legal protections against lawsuits, while others worry that this will deny borrowers a critical safeguard.
lead_paragraph: As regulators complete new mortgage rules, banks are about to get a significant advantage: protection against homeowner lawsuits.
